summit:talk.summit:title: Data Summit opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: Opening remarks

summit:talk.summit:title: Data products: 5 deadly sins and how to prevent them
summit:talk.summit:description: Some of the most critical tendencies Data Product teams might encounter and call to actions to prevent them.

summit:talk.summit:title: Machine Summit opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: Opening remarks

summit:talk.summit:title: Augmented reality: the next industrial revolution
summit:talk.summit:description: In a fireside chat, Matt Kammerait, VP of Product for Daqri and Paul Davies of Boeing explains how the pairing augmented reality wearables with the real time data of the industrial internet of things are poised to revolutionize the Future of Work.

summit:talk.summit:title: Machine Summit opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: Opening remarks by a very special guest, Pepper the robot.

summit:talk.summit:title: Rise of the social robots
summit:talk.summit:description: As we discover the endless possibilities robots and machine learning can have in society, when it comes to healthcare, automation and the workplace, we also need to learn to adapt to new risks and embrace new responsibilities.

summit:talk.summit:title: Machine Summit opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: Opening remarks from Caroline O'Driscoll, Partner at KPMG Ireland.

summit:talk.summit:title: Do you have the right skills to scale?
summit:talk.summit:description: Nate Walkingshaw is the Chief Product Officer of Pluralsight, a growth tech company focused on democratizing technology learning. In his talk he will share four stories on how you can develop products to scale that people love.
JavaScript is eating the world
Application ops Ladder
Opening Remarks

summit:speaker.summit:name: Dr. Nina Byrnes
summit:speaker.summit:info: Founder and Principal GP at Generation Health and MyGlobalERx.com

summit:talk.summit:description: Why the future of healthcare is cognitive

summit:speaker.summit:name: Williams Evans
summit:speaker.summit:info: CMO IBM Watson Health at IBM

summit:talk.summit:description: Adventures in Music Discovery

summit:speaker.summit:name: Matthew Ogle
summit:speaker.summit:info: Sr Product Owner, What To Play at spotify

summit:talk.summit:description: Are records labels Still

summit:talk.summit:title: Design Summit opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: Opening remarks

summit:talk.summit:title: Culture crafting - how designers reimagine and define your future
summit:talk.summit:description: Society has become obsessed with cool tech products, and Design has become the single most powerful economic driver. How are designers creating these winning solutions that are meaningful to you, while advancing culture at large?

summit:speaker.summit:name: Dan Harden
summit:speaker.summit:info: President, CEO & Principal Designer, Whipsaw, Inc.

summit:talk.summit:title: Mother's home cooking
summit:talk.summit:description: Why does a financial services institution need a Chief Data Officer (CDO)? JP Rangaswami CDO of Deutsche Bank will illustrate how knowing data is helping financial firms respond to numerous critical and complex market and regulatory demands

summit:talk.summit:title: Fintech 2.0
summit:talk.summit:description: Beyond the disruption we've seen in payments, lending and investments, what are the next trillion-dollar opportunities in financial services that are ripe for ambitious entrepreneurs and co-founders to exploit?

summit:speaker.summit:name: Victor Matarranz
summit:speaker.summit:info: SVP & Head of Group Strategy, Santander

summit:talk.summit:name: Making technology influence people
summit:talk.summit:description: Modern marketers and brands have had to embrace technology in order to stay relevant. Is it always a case of 'failing better"? Or have we reached a new level of customer engagement that has changed the game in terms of brand messaging?

summit:speaker.summit:name: Jason Musante
summit:speaker.summit:info: Group ECD/Managing Director at havas Worldwide

summit:talk.summit:name: The Real Life math man
summit:talk.summit:description: What does market research in the age of big data? The real life math man Eric Salama will illuminate in conversation with Greg Williams of Wired

summit:talk.summit:name: Monetizing Social
summit:talk.summit:description: AdAs part of one of the most engaging platforms on the Internet, Tim Kendall has monetized Pinterest in new and interesting ways including by launching Buyable Pins in June. He will discuss in a little more detail the company's commerce plans.

summit:talk.summit:name: Resist and trive
summit:talk.summit:description: Avoiding the pressure to optimize for profit seems impossible in 2015. Yancey Strickler of Kickstarter will outline the path to independence and real value, not just valuation.

summit:talk.summit:name: Advertising state of the nation
summit:talk.summit:description: There are few more accomplished figures in the world of advertising than Harris Diamond. In this fireside with Jim Edwards of Business Insider, he will address the underlying issues affecting advertising in 2015....

summit:speaker.summit:name: Jonathan Cloonan
summit:speaker.summit:info: Senior Director at Group M Entertainment

summit:talk.summit:name: Video killed the TV ad
summit:talk.summit:description: Video is quickly taking over. The likes of YouTube and Facebook are amongst the platforms but who are the video advertising companies driving the next wave of visual advertising and what's the ultimate ambition?

summit:talk.summit:title: Centre Stage opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: The founder of Web Summit's welcoming remarks

summit:talk.summit:title: Bringing VR to the masses
summit:talk.summit:description: Just how mainstream will VR become? The inventor of Oculus Rift shares his vision for the future.

summit:talk.summit:title: Centre Stage opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: The founder of Web Summit's welcoming remarks for the second day.

summit:talk.summit:title: Why are there not more European unicorns?
summit:talk.summit:description: This year has seen the emergence of more European unicorns but the continent still seems to lag behind other markets. Are the conditions right in Europe? Could the dynamic between investor and company be the solution?

summit:talk.summit:title: Centre Stage opening remarks
summit:talk.summit:description: The founder of Web Summit's welcoming remarks

summit:talk.summit:description: Beyond the disruption we've seen in payments, lending and investments, what are the next trillion-dollar opportunities in financial services that are ripe for ambitious entrepreneurs and co-founders to exploit?
